hero.subtitle: Your partner in progress, empowering every step toward Indonesia's success.

companySection.heading: is the official distributor of Tekiro, RYU, and Rexco brands in Indonesia.
companySection.description: We deliver high-quality tools, machinery, and chemicals that are sturdy, innovative, and reliable. With an extensive distribution network, we become partners for professionals and individuals in supporting various needs.

brandSection.description: Leading brands under PT. Altama Surya Anugerah.
brandSection.awardDescription: This year PT. Altama Surya Anugerah won the Digital Populer Brand Award 2023 for Tekiro brand in the Handtools category and Ryu in the Powertools category.
